companies.name: PLASK
companies.description: PLASK is an AI-powered motion capture and animation platform that transforms video footage into professional 3D animations using only a webcam. The web-based tool leverages deep learning to extract precise motion data, making high-quality animation creation accessible and affordable for creators, game developers, and educators. PLASK supports seamless integration with industry-standard 3D software and offers intuitive controls for lighting, camera, and export options.
companies.categories: Animation/Film, Artifical Intelligence (AI), Motion Capture Software/Hardware, Web 3D
